education_text.0: Oren Etzioni (born 1964)          is an American entrepreneur, Professor Emeritus of computer science, and founding CEO of the      redirect    Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence (AI2)Etzioni joined the      University of Washington University of Washington faculty in 1991, immediately after receiving his PhDEtzioni's research has been focused on basic problems in the study of intelligence,      redirect    Machine reading machine reading,      Machine learning machine learning and      redirect    Web search web searchEtzioni's research has been focused on basic problems in the study of intelligence,      redirect    Machine reading machine reading,      Machine learning machine learning and      redirect    Web search web search
